changes.title: General
items: Updated to work with App Hub 1.0.0

changes.title: General
items: Changed request method back to POST

changes.title: General
items: Changed request method from POST to GET until Mike decides to change it back

changes.title: General
items: Inactive player filter now takes into account the minimum and maximum level range
Added guild at and guilds left counter to combat page

changes.title: General
items: Improved the way zero targets on first entered combat are handled
Added top panel alert when user is rate limited
Added alert when no targets were found
Added support for new Mobile Simulation keybinds
Added list of killed players and their count for the current session
Added way to mark user as reached the kill limits (3 kills are the limit)
Players over the kill count are filtered out from the target list

changes.title: General
items: Added page with all wars and those on hold marked

changes.title: Bugs
items: Fixed bug with old guild wars

changes.title: General
items: New and fresh GPvP Tool
Not implemented yet: import/export banned players
Added option to hide guilds
Added support for next target keybind of Mobile Simulation

changes.title: General
items: Updated code to work with new client backend

changes.title: General
items: Guild lists are now ordered
Added way to change order type in Settings
Added account's API key into Settings
Added option to skip guild at target generation
Preparation for custom list of guilds

changes.title: Bugs
items: Potentially fixed main API key bug

changes.title: Bugs
items: Fixed the fetch and second fetch bug

changes.title: Bugs
items: Fixed wrong starting guild at second fetch

changes.title: General
items: Added guild shuffle
Added cooldown to attack button
Generating targets will first fetch 40 and once you kill more than half targets, it will fetch what is left

changes.title: Bugs
items: Fixed wrong result at filtering

changes.title: Bugs
items: Fixed blocking
Fixed removing from block

changes.title: General
items: Let's go and smash!
